metadata.description: Personal collection of plugins and skills

plugins.name: drupal-updates
plugins.description: Perform Drupal core and contributed module updates using Composer

plugins.name: update-orchestrator
plugins.description: Orchestrate dependency updates across multiple Drupal and Node.js projects

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective Claude Code skills

plugins.description: Update Node.js project dependencies using npm with proper version control and testing

plugins.name: worktree-manager
plugins.description: Manage git worktrees for feature development - create, delete, and list worktrees

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Git commit helper command that stages changes and creates commits with context-aware messages
